about_the_game:
This pack includes:
- Porsche Cayman GT4 Carbon Edition
- 45,000 Crew Credits

The Porsche Cayman GT4 (2016) is a car for uncompromising drivers, designed to impress with its lightweight construction, extremely agile chassis setup and unique sound. The Carbon Edition pushes the concept of this legendary car even further with a full carbon fiber aero kit, from bumper to spoiler. This is the perfect vehicle to defeat all your opponents from the starting line.

In addition, 45,000 Crew Credits are included in this bundle, directly available in-game to help you complete your garage in The Crew® 2!
detailed_description:
This pack includes:
- Porsche Cayman GT4 Carbon Edition
- 45,000 Crew Credits

The Porsche Cayman GT4 (2016) is a car for uncompromising drivers, designed to impress with its lightweight construction, extremely agile chassis setup and unique sound. The Carbon Edition pushes the concept of this legendary car even further with a full carbon fiber aero kit, from bumper to spoiler. This is the perfect vehicle to defeat all your opponents from the starting line.

In addition, 45,000 Crew Credits are included in this bundle, directly available in-game to help you complete your garage in The Crew® 2!

package_groups.title: Buy The Crew 2 - Porsche Cayman GT4 2016 Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400s @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX-6100 @ 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD HD 7870 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • Additional Notes: Game contains BattlEye anti-cheat technology and VMProtect anti-piracy technology.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690k @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) or GTX 970 (4GB) or AMD RX 470 (8GB) or better
  • Additional Notes: Game contains BattlEye anti-cheat technology and VMProtect anti-piracy technology.

oflc.descriptors: Mild themes and coarse language Online interactivity

short_description: Unlock the uncompromising Porsche Cayman GT4 Carbon Edition and 45,000 Crew Credits to complete your collection!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
